ing: 2 (1.5 fluid ounce) jiggers melon-flavored vodka (such as SkyyÂ®)
des: "Frosty cocktail slushy made with fresh mint, limeade, and chunks of watermelon."
ins: Combine watermelon, ice cubes, club soda, melon-flavored vodka, limeade concentrate, mint, and sugar in a blender. Blend for 40 seconds; pour into glasses and garnish with strawberries.
